name: Healthier Homemade Mac and Cheese
author: MakeItHealthy
summary: To make this rich mac and cheese recipe healthier we use whole wheat bread crumbs, low-fat milk and cheese, whole wheat noodles, and reduced the amount of butter. Serve with a salad for a healthy meatless dinner.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package whole wheat macaroni (such as Smart Taste®)
½ cup whole wheat bread crumbs
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook elbow macaroni in boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, 8 minutes
Melt 2 tablespoons butter in a saucepan over medium heat
Stir in flour to make a roux
Slowly add milk to roux, stirring constantly
Stir in Cheddar and Parmesan cheeses and cook over low heat until cheese is melted and sauce is thick, about 3 minutes
Place macaroni in large baking dish and pour sauce over macaroni
Melt 2 tablespoons butter in a skillet over medium heat
Add breadcrumbs and stir until butter is absorbed, 2 to 3  minutes
Bake in preheated oven until cheese sauce is hot and breadcrumbs are browned, about 30 minutes
